'''Stephanie Blacker''' is a British actress.

She had a recurring role in the cult series ''The Cut'', and also appeared in ''Blessed'' and ''Doctors''.

She was cast for the [[Season 3|third season]] of ''Game of Thrones'' as [[Violet]]Â in the episodeÂ "[[The Bear and the Maiden Fair (episode)|The Bear and the Maiden Fair]]".Â She was announced on August 30 2012.<ref>[http://winteriscoming.net/2012/08/stephanie-blacker-joins-the-cast/]</ref>

[http://gameofthrones.wikia.com/wiki/George_R.R._Martin George R.R. Martin]Â stated on the DVD commentary of "The Bear and the Maiden Fair" that he had written a scene involving Myranda and Violet for theÂ [http://gameofthrones.wikia.com/wiki/Season_4 fourth season]. Blacker was not available for the fourth season as she was pregnant. Since Martin wrote "[http://gameofthrones.wikia.com/wiki/The_Lion_and_the_Rose The Lion and the Rose]", this seems to suggest that the role played byÂ [http://gameofthrones.wikia.com/wiki/Tansy Tansy]Â in the episode was originally intended for Violet.
